name: Faire Play
text:
Eye spy plenty of surprises in store for you at Darkmoon.

Acquired by winning 5 games in ranked mode, October 2024.

name: Mudan
text:
As long as we’re together, we’ll always bloom brightly!

Obtainable by participating in a special event.

name: Leyara
text:
When it comes to defending the wild, she’s straight fire.

Purchasable when available in the shop.
